HOME LOAN POLICY AND ELIGIBILITY

A home loan is provided by banks and financial institutions for the purchase or construction of residential property.

Eligibility Criteria:
- Applicant must be at least 21 years old.
- Maximum loan tenure can be up to 30 years.
- Stable income source is mandatory.
- Credit score above 700 is generally preferred.

Home Loan Features:
- Interest rates may be fixed or floating.
- Processing fee is charged during loan approval.
- Prepayment and foreclosure charges may apply depending on the loan type.

Required Documents:
- Identity proof
- Address proof
- Income proof
- Property documents
